testcase.name: User adds to the cart the first product from the "Creme" category
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the browser............................................passed And the user navigates to the Creme page....................................passed And the user accepts cookies................................................passed And the user closes newsletter popup........................................passed When the user chooses the first product.....................................passed And the user adds the product to the cart...................................passed Then the correct product name and price will be displayed in the cart.......passed And the user closes the browser.............................................passed
